recent_commits.author: coffincolors

recent_commits.subject: Virtual gamepad gyro, left‑stick option, new turbo/macros + UI and dialog polish; make P1 virtual‑exclusive, updated XServerDisplayActivity to pass winhandler to ControllerAssignmentDialog,update controller assignment name to controller manager in ui, added final proton-9.0-arm64ec to assets with native input bug fixes (recompile with opengl enabled)
recent_commits.author: coffincolors

recent_commits.subject: Add reactive visual feedback for virtual controls. Elements now render a translucent fill while actively pressed (or toggled), using low‑alpha overlays across BUTTON, D‑Pad, Range, Stick, and Trackpad types. Invalidate on touch transitions to ensure immediate redraw.
recent_commits.author: coffincolors

recent_commits.subject: Replace Wine’s xinput1_3 on arm64ec with the stable main.c from the Proton 9.0 x86_64 build, fixing the ARM64 crash in wine_xinput_hid_update, and refresh proton-9.0-arm64ec.txz accordingly. Fix MainActivity permission flow by requesting permissions sequentially and set dark mode default to false. Add a “Disable touchscreen mouse” toggle: the dialog persists the setting and TouchpadView now ignores finger‑driven mouse events while keeping stylus/external mouse and virtual gamepad behavior intact. Restored accidentally removed env setup calls in BionicProgramLauncherComponent. Updated build version name, removed unpatched box64 selection from arrays.xml (no controller support yet), bumped ImageFSInstaller version up to 22. Disabled touchscreen timeout logging.
recent_commits.author: coffincolors

recent_commits.subject: Created MotionControls and moved motion controls to xmenu,complete overhaul of gyroscope implementation, added new icons for testing, fixed issues with controller manager, added vibration to all controllers, made vibration a toggle, added flexbox to gradle, removed .lnk with shortcut, revamped xmenu with sub menus and animation, refined winhandler, controllerassignmentdialog, updated layouts,
recent_commits.author: coffincolors

recent_commits.subject: temporarily disabled relative mouse movement setting, improved controller detection in ControllerAssignmentDialog, fixed auto scrolling bug in EnvVarsView, cleaned up relative mouse mode input handling combined with true mouse control older implementation for request pointer capture, added relative mouse to xserver menu, added mouse icon,
recent_commits.author: coffincolors

recent_commits.subject: Added method to retrieve correct Desktop directory for xuser to Container, added executable .lnk parser to MSLink to parse paths from byte to create shortcuts for orphaned .lnk files, refined layout for settingsfragment, added custom icons selection for shortcuts, added restart application to ExitApp method to ensure no file locks
recent_commits.author: coffincolors

recent_commits.subject: Clean up unused code and remove unnecessary comments from MainActivity, SettingsFragment, ContainerDetailFragment, ShortcutSettingsDialog, ExternalControllerBindingsActivity, WinHandler, remove legacy input method and xinput / dinput settings, remove SDL ENV settings from ContainerDetailsFragment, clean up Winhandler comments and reorganize, cleanup XServerDisplayActivity, disable Winetricks in app and in menu, refine USB Storage Access notification behavior, implement smarter shutdown mechanism with preloader dialog, remove ShortcutBroadcastReceiver and from AndroidManifest, duplicate ImageFsInstaller installerFromAssets related methods (DownloadProgressDialog) and add a callback, update evshim.c comments, disable unnecesasry input handling methods from layouts, remove unused "abc" resources from Winlator 8 attempted merge, finalize Adreno GPU driver icon in Main Menu layout and new Input Controls Icon
